details.arabic_diacless: رب انى ظلمت نـفسى واسلمت مع سليمٰن للٰه رب العٰلمين
details.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّىۡ ظَلَمۡتُ نَـفۡسِىۡ وَاَسۡلَمۡتُ مَعَ سُلَيۡمٰنَ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الۡعٰلَمِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: rabbi innee thalamtunafsee waaslamtu maAAa sulaymana lillahi rabbi alAAalameen
details.translations: "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah , Lord of the worlds."
